body_html:
Yeah, pathlib is standard library in Python 3.

Simplest solution for this to keep compatibility with Python 2 is to simply wrap all paths with str(mypath) to convert pathlib paths to strings.
body_text:
Yeah, pathlib is standard library in Python 3.
Simplest solution for this to keep compatibility with Python 2 is to simply wrap all paths with str(mypath) to convert pathlib paths to strings.
body:
Yeah, `pathlib` is standard library in Python 3.

Simplest solution for this to keep compatibility with Python 2 is to simply wrap all paths with `str(mypath)` to convert `pathlib` paths to strings.
